item.title: oy-expose
item.description: Usage usage: oy-expose [<flags>] Flags: -h, --help Show context-sensitive help (also try --help-long and --help-man). --log.level=info Only log messages with the given severity or above. One of: [debug, info, warn, error] --log.format=logfmt Output format of log messages. One of: [logfmt, json] --version Show application version. Description oy-expose reads a metrics file and exposes its content to be scraped by a Prometheus server.

item.title: oy-runtrace
item.description: Usage usage: oy-runtrace [<flags>] Flags: -h, --help Show context-sensitive help (also try --help-long and --help-man). --log.level=info Only log messages with the given severity or above. One of: [debug, info, warn, error] --log.format=logfmt Output format of log messages. One of: [logfmt, json] --version Show application version. Description oy-runtrace executes a command and sends a trace to the selected OpenTelemetry endpoint. Downloading docker To execute oy-runtrace with docker, run:
